titleInfo.title: Discussion and performance - Divided and United: the Songs of the Civil War - 2013-11-17

mods.abstract: Performance and panel discussion about the album "Divided and United: The Songs of the Civil War" from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 17, 2013.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
